item.title: Update
item.description: Updates on my website! I’m coming along good with git and my website, learing a few things about igt and hugo, works!

item.title: Licence
item.description: Me and my amateur radio licence I shold probably tell you why and how i got my amateur radio licence!

item.title: First
item.description: Welcome to my website! I’m trying to build a website here to show a few projects of mine and may someone will find them useful someday! For writing this website i’m using HUGO, which is a really nice markdown to html framework, check it out here! Thank you for reading, i’ll be on my way and onto builing this thing! Alright, lemme use this as a test page :D codeblocks are a really nice thing right?
